input.sentences: it was this guy 's birthday | so we took him to a restaurant .
his family was all there | and everyone was present .
everyone was excited to be there . they all love the guy .

output.sentences: Polly was given a birthday luncheon by her coworkers at the hospital.
Harriet and Hannah were all smiles at the party.
John and Teresa paired up for a picture to remember the occasion.
The whole crew was there to help Polly celebrate.
John had extra slices of cake.
